name: Laynsb
description: Creator of Laya Battery Monitor & Kernel Tuner addons. Highly optimized binary for CPU and battery efficiency.

name: Kaminarich
description: The master who taught me everything about Android optimization and system internals. A true mentor in this journey.

name: Jvaswb
description: Internal Tester & Core Supporter. Provided invaluable feedback and constant encouragement throughout the development.

name: Opeknew
description: Reliable Internal Tester. Helped identify critical bugs and ensured the app remains stable across different scenarios.

name: Zexshia
description: Inspired by Azenith. A constant source of inspiration and fresh ideas for the visual and functional direction of the app.

name: Rianixia
description: Creator of Rianixia Toolkit. His groundbreaking work on Xiaa Toolkit served as a major inspiration for Rootify's core modules.

name: Gray Ravens Leader
description: The primary motivation and driving force behind this project, inspiring the goal of providing valuable tools to the community.

name: Ray
description: An exceptional internal tester whose precise and structured feedback was essential for refining application stability.

name: Null
description: A diligent internal tester who excelled at discovering critical bugs and improving overall system reliability.

name: Kaze
description: Friend, bug finder, and my personal cheerleader. Basically the reason this project didn't get abandoned halfway through.

name: Dreen
description: Tester who made sure everything actually works. Found bugs in places I didn't even know existed.

name: Sipur
description: The artistic genius behind Rootify's gorgeous banners. Made the app look as good as it performs.

name: Kanagawa Yamada
description: Owner of KLC. My go-to person when I hit a wall. Also inspired by his Project Raco work.

name: Azami
description: A true senior. Helped me understand shell scripting and provided solid code references. Greatly appreciated.

name: Riprog
description: The addon master. Respect to the OG. His work on addons set the standard I aspired to match.

name: TRAVEL - Transsion Developments
description: The birthplace of ideas and a hub for brilliant developers who guided me through complex challenges. A heartfelt thank you to all members for their unwavering support.

name: TranCore Developments
description: The birthplace of ideas and a hub for brilliant developers who guided me through complex challenges. A heartfelt thank you to all members for their unwavering support.

description: The birthplace of ideas and a hub for brilliant developers who guided me through complex challenges. A heartfelt thank you to all members for their unwavering support.
